alert.note: Alert for Ferry; Grant; Lincoln; Stevens (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:24PM PDT until July 10 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lincoln County in eastern Washington... Southwestern Stevens County in northeastern Washington... Southern Ferry County in northeastern Washington... Northeastern Grant County in north central Washington... * Until 515 PM PDT. * At 424 PM PDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 24 miles northwest of Davenport to near Banks Lake South, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Davenport, Banks Lake South, Lincoln, Wilbur, Coulee City, Almira, Creston, Hartline, Govan, Coffeepot Lake, Miles, Telford, Rocklyn, Sherman, and Bagdad Junction. This includes U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 191 and 250. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
